      Steps to reproduce the problem:<b class="line"><!---->Steps to reproduce the problem:<!----></b><br>1. download asan-linux-release-1030370.zip and unzip<span class="line"><!---->1. download asan-linux-release-1030370.zip and unzip<!----></span><br>2. run `./chrome --enable-features=SideSearch,UnifiedSidePanel,SideSearchDSESupport   --user-data-dir=/tmp/noexist`<span class="line"><!---->2. run `./chrome --enable-features=SideSearch,UnifiedSidePanel,SideSearchDSESupport   --user-data-dir=/tmp/noexist`<!----></span><br>3. search anything with<span class="line"><!---->3. search anything with<!----></span> <span class="line"><!----> <!----></span>google.com<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://google.com"><!---->google.com<!----></a> and then navigate to any other search engine (such as<span class="line"><!----> and then navigate to any other search engine (such as<!----></span> <span class="line"><!----> <!----></span>bing.com<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://bing.com"><!---->bing.com<!----></a>)<span class="line"><!---->)<!----></span><br>4. click `Open Search in Side Panel` to open side search in side panel<span class="line"><!---->4. click `Open Search in Side Panel` to open side search in side panel<!----></span><br>5. select any text in side search and right click to choose 'Search Google for XXX'<span class="line"><!---->5. select any text in side search and right click to choose 'Search Google for XXX'<!----></span><br><br>PS: In step 3 you must use <span class="line"><!---->PS: In step 3 you must use <!----></span>`<span class="line"><!---->`<!----></span>google.com<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://google.com"><!---->google.com<!----></a>`. <span class="line"><!---->`. <!----></span>`<span class="line"><!---->`<!----></span>google.com<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://google.com"><!---->google.com<!----></a>.xx`  cannot trigger the Side Search<span class="line"><!---->.xx`  cannot trigger the Side Search<!----></span><br><br>Problem Description:<b class="line"><!---->Problem Description:<!----></b><br># Root Cause <span class="line"><!----># Root Cause <!----></span><br><br>In `WebContentsImpl::OpenURL`[1], when `delelage_->OpenURLFromTab(this, params)` is called(1), the `source_render_frame_host`(2) could be freed in some conditions, the following use of `source_render_frame_host`(3) will cause UAF. <span class="line"><!---->In `WebContentsImpl::OpenURL`[1], when `delelage_-&gt;OpenURLFromTab(this, params)` is called(1), the `source_render_frame_host`(2) could be freed in some conditions, the following use of `source_render_frame_host`(3) will cause UAF. <!----></span><br><br>```[1]<span class="line"><!---->```[1]<!----></span><br>WebContents* WebContentsImpl::OpenURL(const OpenURLParams& params) {<span class="line"><!---->WebContents* WebContentsImpl::OpenURL(const OpenURLParams&amp; params) {<!----></span><br>  TRACE_EVENT1("content", "WebContentsImpl::OpenURL", "url", params.url);<span class="line"><!---->  TRACE_EVENT1("content", "WebContentsImpl::OpenURL", "url", params.url);<!----></span><br>#if DCHECK_IS_ON()<span class="line"><!---->#if DCHECK_IS_ON()<!----></span><br>  DCHECK(params.Valid());<span class="line"><!---->  DCHECK(params.Valid());<!----></span><br>#endif<span class="line"><!---->#endif<!----></span><br><br>  if (!delegate_) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (!delegate_) {<!----></span><br>    // Embedder can delay setting a delegate on new WebContents with<span class="line"><!---->    // Embedder can delay setting a delegate on new WebContents with<!----></span><br>    // WebContentsDelegate::ShouldResumeRequestsForCreatedWindow. In the mean<span class="line"><!---->    // WebContentsDelegate::ShouldResumeRequestsForCreatedWindow. In the mean<!----></span><br>    // time, navigations, including the initial one, that goes through OpenURL<span class="line"><!---->    // time, navigations, including the initial one, that goes through OpenURL<!----></span><br>    // should be delayed until embedder is ready to resume loading.<span class="line"><!---->    // should be delayed until embedder is ready to resume loading.<!----></span><br>    delayed_open_url_params_ = std::make_unique<OpenURLParams>(params);<span class="line"><!---->    delayed_open_url_params_ = std::make_unique&lt;OpenURLParams&gt;(params);<!----></span><br><br>    // If there was a navigation deferred when creating the window through<span class="line"><!---->    // If there was a navigation deferred when creating the window through<!----></span><br>    // CreateNewWindow, drop it in favor of this navigation.<span class="line"><!---->    // CreateNewWindow, drop it in favor of this navigation.<!----></span><br>    delayed_load_url_params_.reset();<span class="line"><!---->    delayed_load_url_params_.reset();<!----></span><br><br>    return nullptr;<span class="line"><!---->    return nullptr;<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br><br>  RenderFrameHost* source_render_frame_host = RenderFrameHost::FromID(  // (2)<span class="line"><!---->  RenderFrameHost* source_render_frame_host = RenderFrameHost::FromID(  // (2)<!----></span><br>      params.source_render_process_id, params.source_render_frame_id);<span class="line"><!---->      params.source_render_process_id, params.source_render_frame_id);<!----></span><br><br>  // Prevent frames that are not active (e.g. a prerendering page) from opening<span class="line"><!---->  // Prevent frames that are not active (e.g. a prerendering page) from opening<!----></span><br>  // new windows, tabs, popups, etc.<span class="line"><!---->  // new windows, tabs, popups, etc.<!----></span><br>  if (params.disposition != WindowOpenDisposition::CURRENT_TAB &&<span class="line"><!---->  if (params.disposition != WindowOpenDisposition::CURRENT_TAB &amp;&amp;<!----></span><br>      source_render_frame_host && !source_render_frame_host->IsActive()) {<span class="line"><!---->      source_render_frame_host &amp;&amp; !source_render_frame_host-&gt;IsActive()) {<!----></span><br>    return nullptr;<span class="line"><!---->    return nullptr;<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br><br>  if (params.frame_tree_node_id != FrameTreeNode::kFrameTreeNodeInvalidId) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (params.frame_tree_node_id != FrameTreeNode::kFrameTreeNodeInvalidId) {<!----></span><br>    if (auto* frame_tree_node =<span class="line"><!---->    if (auto* frame_tree_node =<!----></span><br>            FrameTreeNode::GloballyFindByID(params.frame_tree_node_id)) {<span class="line"><!---->            FrameTreeNode::GloballyFindByID(params.frame_tree_node_id)) {<!----></span><br>      // If a frame tree node ID is specified and it exists, ensure it is for a<span class="line"><!---->      // If a frame tree node ID is specified and it exists, ensure it is for a<!----></span><br>      // node within this WebContents. Note: this WebContents could be hosting<span class="line"><!---->      // node within this WebContents. Note: this WebContents could be hosting<!----></span><br>      // multiple frame trees (e.g. prerendering) so it's not enough to check<span class="line"><!---->      // multiple frame trees (e.g. prerendering) so it's not enough to check<!----></span><br>      // against this->primary_frame_tree_. Check against page_delegate(), which<span class="line"><!---->      // against this-&gt;primary_frame_tree_. Check against page_delegate(), which<!----></span><br>      // is always a WebContentsImpl, while delegate() may be implemented by<span class="line"><!---->      // is always a WebContentsImpl, while delegate() may be implemented by<!----></span><br>      // something else such as for prerendered frame trees.<span class="line"><!---->      // something else such as for prerendered frame trees.<!----></span><br>      FrameTree* frame_tree = frame_tree_node->frame_tree();<span class="line"><!---->      FrameTree* frame_tree = frame_tree_node-&gt;frame_tree();<!----></span><br>      CHECK_EQ(frame_tree->page_delegate(), this);<span class="line"><!---->      CHECK_EQ(frame_tree-&gt;page_delegate(), this);<!----></span><br><br>      // Prerendering and fenced frame navigations are hidden from embedders.<span class="line"><!---->      // Prerendering and fenced frame navigations are hidden from embedders.<!----></span><br>      // If the navigation is targeting a frame in a prerendering or fenced<span class="line"><!---->      // If the navigation is targeting a frame in a prerendering or fenced<!----></span><br>      // frame tree, we shouldn't run that navigation through the embedder<span class="line"><!---->      // frame tree, we shouldn't run that navigation through the embedder<!----></span><br>      // delegate. Embedder implementations of<span class="line"><!---->      // delegate. Embedder implementations of<!----></span><br>      // `WebContentsDelegate::OpenURLFromTab` assume that the primary<span class="line"><!---->      // `WebContentsDelegate::OpenURLFromTab` assume that the primary<!----></span><br>      // frame tree Navigation controller should be used for navigating.<span class="line"><!---->      // frame tree Navigation controller should be used for navigating.<!----></span><br>      // Instead, we just navigate directly on the relevant frame<span class="line"><!---->      // Instead, we just navigate directly on the relevant frame<!----></span><br>      // tree.<span class="line"><!---->      // tree.<!----></span><br>      if (frame_tree->type() == FrameTree::Type::kPrerender ||<span class="line"><!---->      if (frame_tree-&gt;type() == FrameTree::Type::kPrerender ||<!----></span><br>          frame_tree->type() == FrameTree::Type::kFencedFrame) {<span class="line"><!---->          frame_tree-&gt;type() == FrameTree::Type::kFencedFrame) {<!----></span><br>        DCHECK_EQ(params.disposition, WindowOpenDisposition::CURRENT_TAB);<span class="line"><!---->        DCHECK_EQ(params.disposition, WindowOpenDisposition::CURRENT_TAB);<!----></span><br>        frame_tree->controller().LoadURLWithParams(<span class="line"><!---->        frame_tree-&gt;controller().LoadURLWithParams(<!----></span><br>            NavigationController::LoadURLParams(params));<span class="line"><!---->            NavigationController::LoadURLParams(params));<!----></span><br>        return this;<span class="line"><!---->        return this;<!----></span><br>      }<span class="line"><!---->      }<!----></span><br>    } else {<span class="line"><!---->    } else {<!----></span><br>      // If the node doesn't exist it was probably removed from its frame tree.<span class="line"><!---->      // If the node doesn't exist it was probably removed from its frame tree.<!----></span><br>      // In that case, abort since continuing would navigate the root frame.<span class="line"><!---->      // In that case, abort since continuing would navigate the root frame.<!----></span><br>      return nullptr;<span class="line"><!---->      return nullptr;<!----></span><br>    }<span class="line"><!---->    }<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br><br>  WebContents* new_contents = delegate_->OpenURLFromTab(this, params);  //(1)<span class="line"><!---->  WebContents* new_contents = delegate_-&gt;OpenURLFromTab(this, params);  //(1)<!----></span><br><br>  if (source_render_frame_host && params.source_site_instance) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (source_render_frame_host &amp;&amp; params.source_site_instance) {<!----></span><br>    CHECK_EQ(source_render_frame_host->GetSiteInstance(),   // (3)<span class="line"><!---->    CHECK_EQ(source_render_frame_host-&gt;GetSiteInstance(),   // (3)<!----></span><br>             params.source_site_instance.get());<span class="line"><!---->             params.source_site_instance.get());<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br>  if (new_contents && source_render_frame_host && new_contents != this) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (new_contents &amp;&amp; source_render_frame_host &amp;&amp; new_contents != this) {<!----></span><br>    observers_.NotifyObservers(<span class="line"><!---->    observers_.NotifyObservers(<!----></span><br>        &WebContentsObserver::DidOpenRequestedURL, new_contents,<span class="line"><!---->        &amp;WebContentsObserver::DidOpenRequestedURL, new_contents,<!----></span><br>        source_render_frame_host, params.url, params.referrer,<span class="line"><!---->        source_render_frame_host, params.url, params.referrer,<!----></span><br>        params.disposition, params.transition, params.started_from_context_menu,<span class="line"><!---->        params.disposition, params.transition, params.started_from_context_menu,<!----></span><br>        params.is_renderer_initiated);<span class="line"><!---->        params.is_renderer_initiated);<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br><br>  return new_contents;<span class="line"><!---->  return new_contents;<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>When calling `OpenURLFromTab`, SideSearch will actually call `UnifiedSideSearchController::OpenURLFromTab`[2], it will use SideSearch's `browser_view` to call `OpenURL`. According to the ASAN log[3], `OpenURL` will  change to a new Tab, so the SidePanel will Close and destroy the corresponding FrameTree and RenderFrameHost.<span class="line"><!---->When calling `OpenURLFromTab`, SideSearch will actually call `UnifiedSideSearchController::OpenURLFromTab`[2], it will use SideSearch's `browser_view` to call `OpenURL`. According to the ASAN log[3], `OpenURL` will  change to a new Tab, so the SidePanel will Close and destroy the corresponding FrameTree and RenderFrameHost.<!----></span><br><br><br>```[2]<span class="line"><!---->```[2]<!----></span><br>content::WebContents* UnifiedSideSearchController::OpenURLFromTab(<span class="line"><!---->content::WebContents* UnifiedSideSearchController::OpenURLFromTab(<!----></span><br>    content::WebContents* source,<span class="line"><!---->    content::WebContents* source,<!----></span><br>    const content::OpenURLParams& params) {<span class="line"><!---->    const content::OpenURLParams&amp; params) {<!----></span><br>  auto* browser_view = GetBrowserView();<span class="line"><!---->  auto* browser_view = GetBrowserView();<!----></span><br>  return browser_view ? browser_view->browser()->OpenURL(params) : nullptr;<span class="line"><!---->  return browser_view ? browser_view-&gt;browser()-&gt;OpenURL(params) : nullptr;<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br><br>```[3]<span class="line"><!---->```[3]<!----></span><br>#18 0x562c75138396 in SidePanelCoordinator::Close() chrome/browser/ui/views/side_panel/side_panel_coordinator.cc:270:5<span class="line"><!---->#18 0x562c75138396 in SidePanelCoordinator::Close() chrome/browser/ui/views/side_panel/side_panel_coordinator.cc:270:5<!----></span><br>#19 0x562c74598ae2 in TabStripModel::OnChange(TabStripModelChange const&, TabStripSelectionChange const&) chrome/browser/ui/tabs/tab_strip_model.cc:461:14<span class="line"><!---->#19 0x562c74598ae2 in TabStripModel::OnChange(TabStripModelChange const&amp;, TabStripSelectionChange const&amp;) chrome/browser/ui/tabs/tab_strip_model.cc:461:14<!----></span><br>#20 0x562c745975c5 in TabStripModel::InsertWebContentsAtImpl(int, std::Cr::unique_ptr<content::WebContents, std::Cr::default_delete<content::WebContents>>, int, absl::optional<tab_groups::Tab<span class="line"><!---->#20 0x562c745975c5 in TabStripModel::InsertWebContentsAtImpl(int, std::Cr::unique_ptr&lt;content::WebContents, std::Cr::default_delete&lt;content::WebContents&gt;&gt;, int, absl::optional&lt;tab_groups::Tab<!----></span><br><br>Additional Comments:<b class="line"><!---->Additional Comments:<!----></b><br><br><br>Chrome version: <b class="line"><!---->Chrome version: <!----></b>103.0.0.0 <span class="line"><!---->103.0.0.0 <!----></span>Channel: <b class="line"><!---->Channel: <!----></b>Not sure<span class="line"><!---->Not sure<!----></span><br><br>OS:<b class="line"><!---->OS:<!----></b>Linux<span class="line"><!---->Linux<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        I can reproduce this in 1030430 (which is M106), but not 1012727 (104) or 1002919 (103). From what I can tell `--enable-features=SideSearch,SideSearchDSESupport` actually suffices for this (i.e. UnifiedSidePanel isn't required).<span class="line"><!---->I can reproduce this in 1030430 (which is M106), but not 1012727 (104) or 1002919 (103). From what I can tell `--enable-features=SideSearch,SideSearchDSESupport` actually suffices for this (i.e. UnifiedSidePanel isn't required).<!----></span><br><br>@Reporter: You seem to have tested with 1030370 (M106), but also say "Chrome version: 103.0.0.0". Could you confirm that you're only seeing this in M106?<span class="line"><!---->@Reporter: You seem to have tested with 1030370 (M106), but also say "Chrome version: 103.0.0.0". Could you confirm that you're only seeing this in M106?<!----></span><br><br>FoundIn-M106 for now. <span class="line"><!---->FoundIn-M106 for now. <!----></span><br><br>This is browser process memory corruption, but the interaction required to trigger it is pretty specific, hence Security_Severity-High rather than Critical.<span class="line"><!---->This is browser process memory corruption, but the interaction required to trigger it is pretty specific, hence Security_Severity-High rather than Critical.<!----></span><br><br>From what I can tell, at least SideSearchDSESupport isn't yet enabled in Stable, so this should probably be Security_Impact-Dev or something like that. But I'll wait for the feature team to confirm which channels this actually impacts currently.<span class="line"><!---->From what I can tell, at least SideSearchDSESupport isn't yet enabled in Stable, so this should probably be Security_Impact-Dev or something like that.         Currently this will only repro in versions M105+.<span class="line"><!---->Currently this will only repro in versions M105+.<!----></span><br><br>This requires Side Search and the Unified Side Panel to both be enabled (i.e. --enable-features=SideSearch,UnifiedSidePanel,SideSearchDSESupport ) - and for Side Search to be running the code that integrates it with the Unified Side Panel. The integration was added in Chrome M105.<span class="line"><!---->This requires Side Search and the Unified Side Panel to both be enabled (i.e. --enable-features=SideSearch,UnifiedSidePanel,SideSearchDSESupport ) - and for Side Search to be running the code that integrates it with the Unified Side Panel. The integration was added in Chrome M105.<!----></span><br><br>To trigger the crash the user needs to explicitly enable the UnifiedSidePanel flag on M105 since the UnifiedSidePanel flag is currently only at 50% Canary / Dev. This likely still warrants a RBS label however so we'll want the fix to land by stable cut later this month.<span class="line"><!---->To trigger the crash the user needs to explicitly enable the UnifiedSidePanel flag on M105 since the UnifiedSidePanel flag is currently only at 50% Canary / Dev. This likely still warrants a RBS label however so we'll want the fix to land by stable cut later this month.<!----></span><br><br>Yuheng is working on a fix and we should have this ready for a merge soon.<span class="line"><!---->Yuheng is working on a fix and we should have this ready for a merge soon.<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2"><!---->d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2<!----></a><br>Author: Yuheng Huang <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Yuheng Huang &lt;<!----></span>yuhengh@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yuhengh@chromium.org"><!---->yuhengh@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Sun Aug 07 23:40:07 2022<span class="line"><!---->Date: Sun Aug 07 23:40:07 2022<!----></span><br><br>Side search v2: fix uaf with right click search<span class="line"><!---->Side search v2: fix uaf with right click search<!----></span><br><br>When right click context menu and search Google for ... from the side<span class="line"><!---->When right click context menu and search Google for ... from the side<!----></span><br>search side panel, a new foreground will be created to trigger closing the side panel. When side panel is closed, it destroys the side panel WebView, which destroys side search side panel WebContents and cause a UaF inside WebContentsImpl::OpenURL.<span class="line"><!---->search side panel, a new foreground will be created to trigger closing the side panel. When side panel is closed, it destroys the side panel WebView, which destroys side search side panel WebContents and cause a UaF inside WebContentsImpl::OpenURL.<!----></span><br><br>This CL prevents WebView from destroying side search side panel WebContents when side search entry is still active in this particular case. A possibly better approach in the future may be have the side panel framework not destroy the view when the side panel entry is still active.<span class="line"><!---->This CL prevents WebView from destroying side search side panel WebContents when side search entry is still active in this particular case. A possibly better approach in the future may be have the side panel framework not destroy the view when the side panel entry is still active.<!----></span><br><br>Bug: 1349687<a class="strike-through"         Merge review required: M105 is already shipping to beta.<span class="line"><!---->Merge review required: M105 is already shipping to beta.<!----></span><br><br>Please answer the following questions so that we can safely process your merge request:<span class="line"><!---->Please answer the following questions so that we can safely process your merge request:<!----></span><br>1. Why does your merge fit within the merge criteria for these milestones?<span class="line"><!---->1. Why does your merge fit within the merge criteria for these milestones?<!----></span><br>- Chrome Browser: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome Browser: <!----></span>https://chromiumdash.appspot.com/branches<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromiumdash.appspot.com/branches"><!---->https://chromiumdash.appspot.com/branches<!----></a><br>- Chrome OS: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome OS: <!----></span>https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines"><!---->https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<!----></a><br>2. What changes specifically would you like to merge? Please link to Gerrit.<span class="line"><!---->2. What changes specifically would you like to merge? Please link to Gerrit.<!----></span><br>3. Have the changes been released and tested on canary?<span class="line"><!---->3. Have the changes been released and tested on canary?<!----></span><br>4. Is this a new feature? If yes, is it behind a Finch flag and are experiments active in any release channels?<span class="line"><!---->4. Is this a new feature? If yes, is it behind a Finch flag and are experiments active in any release channels?<!----></span><br>5. [Chrome OS only]: Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? <span class="line"><!---->5. When side panel is closed, it destroys the side panel WebView, which destroys side search side panel WebContents and cause a UaF inside WebContentsImpl::OpenURL.<span class="line"><!---->search side panel, a new foreground will be created to trigger closing the side panel. When side panel is closed, it destroys the side panel WebView, which destroys side search side panel WebContents and cause a UaF inside WebContentsImpl::OpenURL.<!----></span><br><br>This CL prevents WebView from destroying side search side panel WebContents when side search entry is still active in this particular case. A possibly better approach in the future may be have the side panel framework not destroy the view when the side panel entry is still active.<span class="line"><!---->This CL prevents WebView from destroying side search side panel WebContents when side search entry is still active in this particular case.         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

      Steps to reproduce the problem:<b class="line"><!---->Steps to reproduce the problem:<!----></b><br>1. download asan-linux-release-1030370.zip and unzip<span class="line"><!---->1. download asan-linux-release-1030370.zip and unzip<!----></span><br>2. run `./chrome --enable-features=SideSearch,UnifiedSidePanel,SideSearchDSESupport   --user-data-dir=/tmp/noexist`<span class="line"><!---->2. run `./chrome --enable-features=SideSearch,UnifiedSidePanel,SideSearchDSESupport   --user-data-dir=/tmp/noexist`<!----></span><br>3. search anything with<span class="line"><!---->3. search anything with<!----></span> <span class="line"><!----> <!----></span>google.com<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://google.com"><!---->google.com<!----></a> and then navigate to any other search engine (such as<span class="line"><!----> and then navigate to any other search engine (such as<!----></span> <span class="line"><!----> <!----></span>bing.com<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://bing.com"><!---->bing.com<!----></a>)<span class="line"><!---->)<!----></span><br>4. click `Open Search in Side Panel` to open side search in side panel<span class="line"><!---->4. click `Open Search in Side Panel` to open side search in side panel<!----></span><br>5. select any text in side search and right click to choose 'Search Google for XXX'<span class="line"><!---->5. select any text in side search and right click to choose 'Search Google for XXX'<!----></span><br><br>PS: In step 3 you must use <span class="line"><!---->PS: In step 3 you must use <!----></span>`<span class="line"><!---->`<!----></span>google.com<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://google.com"><!---->google.com<!----></a>`. <span class="line"><!---->`. <!----></span>`<span class="line"><!---->`<!----></span>google.com<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://google.com"><!---->google.com<!----></a>.xx`  cannot trigger the Side Search<span class="line"><!---->.xx`  cannot trigger the Side Search<!----></span><br><br>Problem Description:<b class="line"><!---->Problem Description:<!----></b><br># Root Cause <span class="line"><!----># Root Cause <!----></span><br><br>In `WebContentsImpl::OpenURL`[1], when `delelage_->OpenURLFromTab(this, params)` is called(1), the `source_render_frame_host`(2) could be freed in some conditions, the following use of `source_render_frame_host`(3) will cause UAF. <span class="line"><!---->In `WebContentsImpl::OpenURL`[1], when `delelage_-&gt;OpenURLFromTab(this, params)` is called(1), the `source_render_frame_host`(2) could be freed in some conditions, the following use of `source_render_frame_host`(3) will cause UAF. <!----></span><br><br>```[1]<span class="line"><!---->```[1]<!----></span><br>WebContents* WebContentsImpl::OpenURL(const OpenURLParams& params) {<span class="line"><!---->WebContents* WebContentsImpl::OpenURL(const OpenURLParams&amp; params) {<!----></span><br>  TRACE_EVENT1("content", "WebContentsImpl::OpenURL", "url", params.url);<span class="line"><!---->  TRACE_EVENT1("content", "WebContentsImpl::OpenURL", "url", params.url);<!----></span><br>#if DCHECK_IS_ON()<span class="line"><!---->#if DCHECK_IS_ON()<!----></span><br>  DCHECK(params.Valid());<span class="line"><!---->  DCHECK(params.Valid());<!----></span><br>#endif<span class="line"><!---->#endif<!----></span><br><br>  if (!delegate_) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (!delegate_) {<!----></span><br>    // Embedder can delay setting a delegate on new WebContents with<span class="line"><!---->    // Embedder can delay setting a delegate on new WebContents with<!----></span><br>    // WebContentsDelegate::ShouldResumeRequestsForCreatedWindow. In the mean<span class="line"><!---->    // WebContentsDelegate::ShouldResumeRequestsForCreatedWindow. In the mean<!----></span><br>    // time, navigations, including the initial one, that goes through OpenURL<span class="line"><!---->    // time, navigations, including the initial one, that goes through OpenURL<!----></span><br>    // should be delayed until embedder is ready to resume loading.<span class="line"><!---->    // should be delayed until embedder is ready to resume loading.<!----></span><br>    delayed_open_url_params_ = std::make_unique<OpenURLParams>(params);<span class="line"><!---->    delayed_open_url_params_ = std::make_unique&lt;OpenURLParams&gt;(params);<!----></span><br><br>    // If there was a navigation deferred when creating the window through<span class="line"><!---->    // If there was a navigation deferred when creating the window through<!----></span><br>    // CreateNewWindow, drop it in favor of this navigation.<span class="line"><!---->    // CreateNewWindow, drop it in favor of this navigation.<!----></span><br>    delayed_load_url_params_.reset();<span class="line"><!---->    delayed_load_url_params_.reset();<!----></span><br><br>    return nullptr;<span class="line"><!---->    return nullptr;<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br><br>  RenderFrameHost* source_render_frame_host = RenderFrameHost::FromID(  // (2)<span class="line"><!----> params.source_render_process_id, params.source_render_frame_id);<!----></span><br><br>  // Prevent frames that are not active (e.g. a prerendering page) from opening<span class="line"><!---->  // Prevent frames that are not active (e.g. a prerendering page) from opening<!----></span><br>  // new windows, tabs, popups, etc.<span class="line"><!---->  // new windows, tabs, popups, etc.<!----></span><br>  if (params.disposition != WindowOpenDisposition::CURRENT_TAB &&<span class="line"><!---->  if (params.disposition != WindowOpenDisposition::CURRENT_TAB &amp;&amp;<!----></span><br>      source_render_frame_host && !source_render_frame_host->IsActive()) {<span class="line"><!---->      source_render_frame_host &amp;&amp; !source_render_frame_host-&gt;IsActive()) {<!----></span><br>    return nullptr;<span class="line"><!---->    return nullptr;<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br><br>  if (params.frame_tree_node_id != FrameTreeNode::kFrameTreeNodeInvalidId) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (params.frame_tree_node_id != FrameTreeNode::kFrameTreeNodeInvalidId) {<!----></span><br>    if (auto* frame_tree_node =<span class="line"><!---->    if (auto* frame_tree_node =<!----></span><br>            FrameTreeNode::GloballyFindByID(params.frame_tree_node_id)) {<span class="line"><!---->            FrameTreeNode::GloballyFindByID(params.frame_tree_node_id)) {<!----></span><br>      // If a frame tree node ID is specified and it exists, ensure it is for a<span class="line"><!---->      // If a frame tree node ID is specified and it exists, ensure it is for a<!----></span><br>      // node within this WebContents. Note: this WebContents could be hosting<span class="line"><!---->      // node within this WebContents. Note: this WebContents could be hosting<!----></span><br>      // multiple frame trees (e.g. prerendering) so it's not enough to check<span class="line"><!---->      // multiple frame trees (e.g. prerendering) so it's not enough to check<!----></span><br>      // against this->primary_frame_tree_. Check against page_delegate(), which<span class="line"><!---->      // against this-&gt;primary_frame_tree_. Check against page_delegate(), which<!----></span><br>      // is always a WebContentsImpl, while delegate() may be implemented by<span class="line"><!---->      // is always a WebContentsImpl, while delegate() may be implemented by<!----></span><br>      // something else such as for prerendered frame trees.<span class="line"><!---->      // something else such as for prerendered frame trees.<!----></span><br>      FrameTree* frame_tree = frame_tree_node->frame_tree();<span class="line"><!---->      FrameTree* frame_tree = frame_tree_node-&gt;frame_tree();<!----></span><br>      CHECK_EQ(frame_tree->page_delegate(), this);<span class="line"><!---->      CHECK_EQ(frame_tree-&gt;page_delegate(), this);<!----></span><br><br>      // Prerendering and fenced frame navigations are hidden from embedders.<span class="line"><!---->      // Prerendering and fenced frame navigations are hidden from embedders.<!----></span><br>      // If the navigation is targeting a frame in a prerendering or fenced<span class="line"><!---->      // If the navigation is targeting a frame in a prerendering or fenced<!----></span><br>      // frame tree, we shouldn't run that navigation through the embedder<span class="line"><!---->      // frame tree, we shouldn't run that navigation through the embedder<!----></span><br>      // delegate. Embedder implementations of<span class="line"><!---->      // delegate. Embedder implementations of<!----></span><br>      // `WebContentsDelegate::OpenURLFromTab` assume that the primary<span class="line"><!---->      // `WebContentsDelegate::OpenURLFromTab` assume that the primary<!----></span><br>      // frame tree Navigation controller should be used for navigating.<span class="line"><!---->      // frame tree Navigation controller should be used for navigating.<!----></span><br>      // Instead, we just navigate directly on the relevant frame<span class="line"><!---->      // Instead, we just navigate directly on the relevant frame<!----></span><br>      // tree.<span class="line"><!---->      // tree.<!----></span><br>      if (frame_tree->type() == FrameTree::Type::kPrerender ||<span class="line"><!---->      if (frame_tree-&gt;type() == FrameTree::Type::kPrerender ||<!----></span><br>          frame_tree->type() == FrameTree::Type::kFencedFrame) {<span class="line"><!---->          frame_tree-&gt;type() == FrameTree::Type::kFencedFrame) {<!----></span><br>        DCHECK_EQ(params.disposition, WindowOpenDisposition::CURRENT_TAB);<span class="line"><!---->        DCHECK_EQ(params.disposition, WindowOpenDisposition::CURRENT_TAB);<!----></span><br>        frame_tree->controller().LoadURLWithParams(<span class="line"><!---->        frame_tree-&gt;controller().LoadURLWithParams(<!----></span><br>            NavigationController::LoadURLParams(params));<span class="line"><!---->            NavigationController::LoadURLParams(params));<!----></span><br>        return this;<span class="line"><!---->        return this;<!----></span><br>      }<span class="line"><!---->      }<!----></span><br>    } else {<span class="line"><!---->    } else {<!----></span><br>      // If the node doesn't exist it was probably removed from its frame tree.<span class="line"><!---->      // If the node doesn't exist it was probably removed from its frame tree.<!----></span><br>      // In that case, abort since continuing would navigate the root frame.<span class="line"><!---->      // In that case, abort since continuing would navigate the root frame.<!----></span><br>      return nullptr;<span class="line"><!---->      return nullptr;<!----></span><br>    }<span class="line"><!---->    }<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br><br>  WebContents* new_contents = delegate_->OpenURLFromTab(this, params);  //(1)<span class="line"><!---->  WebContents* new_contents = delegate_-&gt;OpenURLFromTab(this, params);  //(1)<!----></span><br><br>  if (source_render_frame_host && params.source_site_instance) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (source_render_frame_host &amp;&amp; params.source_site_instance) {<!----></span><br>    CHECK_EQ(source_render_frame_host->GetSiteInstance(),   // (3)<span class="line"><!---->    CHECK_EQ(source_render_frame_host-&gt;GetSiteInstance(),   // (3)<!----></span><br>             params.source_site_instance.get());<span class="line"><!---->             params.source_site_instance.get());<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br>  if (new_contents && source_render_frame_host && new_contents != this) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (new_contents &amp;&amp; source_render_frame_host &amp;&amp; new_contents != this) {<!----></span><br>    observers_.NotifyObservers(<span class="line"><!---->    observers_.NotifyObservers(<!----></span><br>        &WebContentsObserver::DidOpenRequestedURL, new_contents,<span class="line"><!---->        &amp;WebContentsObserver::DidOpenRequestedURL, new_contents,<!----></span><br>        source_render_frame_host, params.url, params.referrer,<span class="line"><!---->        source_render_frame_host, params.url, params.referrer,<!----></span><br>        params.disposition, params.transition, params.started_from_context_menu,<span class="line"><!---->        params.disposition, params.transition, params.started_from_context_menu,<!----></span><br>        params.is_renderer_initiated);<span class="line"><!---->        params.is_renderer_initiated);<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br><br>  return new_contents;<span class="line"><!---->  return new_contents;<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>When calling `OpenURLFromTab`, SideSearch will actually call `UnifiedSideSearchController::OpenURLFromTab`[2], it will use SideSearch's `browser_view` to call `OpenURL`. According to the ASAN log[3], `OpenURL` will  change to a new Tab, so the SidePanel will Close and destroy the corresponding FrameTree and RenderFrameHost.<span class="line"><!---->When calling `OpenURLFromTab`, SideSearch will actually call `UnifiedSideSearchController::OpenURLFromTab`[2], it will use SideSearch's `browser_view` to call `OpenURL`. According to the ASAN log[3], `OpenURL` will  change to a new Tab, so the SidePanel will Close and destroy the corresponding FrameTree and RenderFrameHost.<!----></span><br><br><br>```[2]<span class="line"><!---->```[2]<!----></span><br>content::WebContents* UnifiedSideSearchController::OpenURLFromTab(<span class="line"><!---->content::WebContents* UnifiedSideSearchController::OpenURLFromTab(<!----></span><br>    content::WebContents* source,<span class="line"><!---->    content::WebContents* source,<!----></span><br>    const content::OpenURLParams& params) {<span class="line"><!---->    const content::OpenURLParams&amp; params) {<!----></span><br>  auto* browser_view = GetBrowserView();<span class="line"><!---->  auto* browser_view = GetBrowserView();<!----></span><br>  return browser_view ? browser_view->browser()->OpenURL(params) : nullptr;<span class="line"><!---->  return browser_view ? browser_view-&gt;browser()-&gt;OpenURL(params) : nullptr;<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br><br>```[3]<span class="line"><!---->```[3]<!----></span><br>#18 0x562c75138396 in SidePanelCoordinator::Close() chrome/browser/ui/views/side_panel/side_panel_coordinator.cc:270:5<span class="line"><!---->#18 0x562c75138396 in SidePanelCoordinator::Close() chrome/browser/ui/views/side_panel/side_panel_coordinator.cc:270:5<!----></span><br>#19 0x562c74598ae2 in TabStripModel::OnChange(TabStripModelChange const&, TabStripSelectionChange const&) chrome/browser/ui/tabs/tab_strip_model.cc:461:14<span class="line"><!---->#19 0x562c74598ae2 in TabStripModel::OnChange(TabStripModelChange const&amp;, TabStripSelectionChange const&amp;) chrome/browser/ui/tabs/tab_strip_model.cc:461:14<!----></span><br>#20 0x562c745975c5 in TabStripModel::InsertWebContentsAtImpl(int, std::Cr::unique_ptr<content::WebContents, std::Cr::default_delete<content::WebContents>>, int, absl::optional<tab_groups::Tab<span class="line"><!---->#20 0x562c745975c5 in TabStripModel::InsertWebContentsAtImpl(int, std::Cr::unique_ptr&lt;content::WebContents, std::Cr::default_delete&lt;content::WebContents&gt;&gt;, int, absl::optional&lt;tab_groups::Tab<!----></span><br><br>Additional Comments:<b class="line"><!---->Additional Comments:<!----></b><br><br><br>Chrome version: <b class="line"><!---->Chrome version: <!----></b>103.0.0.0 <span class="line"><!---->103.0.0.0 <!----></span>Channel: <b class="line"><!---->Channel: <!----></b>Not sure<span class="line"><!---->Not sure<!----></span><br><br>OS:<b class="line"><!---->OS:<!----></b>Linux<span class="line"><!---->Linux<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        I can reproduce this in 1030430 (which is M106), but not 1012727 (104) or 1002919 (103). From what I can tell `--enable-features=SideSearch,SideSearchDSESupport` actually suffices for this (i.e. UnifiedSidePanel isn't required).<span class="line"><!---->I can reproduce this in 1030430 (which is M106), but not 1012727 (104) or 1002919 (103). From what I can tell `--enable-features=SideSearch,SideSearchDSESupport` actually suffices for this (i.e. UnifiedSidePanel isn't required).<!----></span><br><br>@Reporter: You seem to have tested with 1030370 (M106), but also say "Chrome version: 103.0.0.0".         Currently this will only repro in versions M105+.<span class="line"><!---->Currently this will only repro in versions M105+.<!----></span><br><br>This requires Side Search and the Unified Side Panel to both be enabled (i.e. --enable-features=SideSearch,UnifiedSidePanel,SideSearchDSESupport ) - and for Side Search to be running the code that integrates it with the Unified Side Panel. The integration was added in Chrome M105.<span class="line"><!---->This requires Side Search and the Unified Side Panel to both be enabled (i.e. --enable-features=SideSearch,UnifiedSidePanel,SideSearchDSESupport ) - and for Side Search to be running the code that integrates it with the Unified Side Panel. The integration was added in Chrome M105.<!----></span><br><br>To trigger the crash the user needs to explicitly enable the UnifiedSidePanel flag on M105 since the UnifiedSidePanel flag is currently only at 50% Canary / Dev. This likely still warrants a RBS label however so we'll want the fix to land by stable cut later this month.<span class="line"><!---->To trigger the crash the user needs to explicitly enable the UnifiedSidePanel flag on M105 since the UnifiedSidePanel flag is currently only at 50% Canary / Dev. This likely still warrants a RBS label however so we'll want the fix to land by stable cut later this month.<!----></span><br><br>Yuheng is working on a fix and we should have this ready for a merge soon.<span class="line"><!---->Yuheng is working on a fix and we should have this ready for a merge soon.<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2"><!---->d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2<!----></a><br>Author: Yuheng Huang <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Yuheng Huang &lt;<!----></span>yuhengh@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yuhengh@chromium.org"><!---->yuhengh@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Sun Aug 07 23:40:07 2022<span class="line"><!---->Date: Sun Aug 07 23:40:07 2022<!----></span><br><br>Side search v2: fix uaf with right click search<span class="line"><!---->Side search v2: fix uaf with right click search<!----></span><br><br>When right click context menu and search Google for ... from the side<span class="line"><!---->When right click context menu and search Google for ... from the side<!----></span><br>search side panel, a new foreground will be created to trigger closing the side panel. When side panel is closed, it destroys the side panel WebView, which destroys side search side panel WebContents and cause a UaF inside WebContentsImpl::OpenURL.<span class="line"><!---->search side panel, a new foreground will be created to trigger closing the side panel. When side panel is closed, it destroys the side panel WebView, which destroys side search side panel WebContents and cause a UaF inside WebContentsImpl::OpenURL.<!----></span><br><br>This CL prevents WebView from destroying side search side panel WebContents when side search entry is still active in this particular case. A possibly better approach in the future may be have the side panel framework not destroy the view when the side panel entry is still active.<span class="line"><!---->This CL prevents WebView from destroying side search side panel WebContents when side search entry is still active in this particular case. A possibly better approach in the future may be have the side panel framework not destroy the view when the side panel entry is still active.<!----></span><br><br>Bug: 1349687<a class="strike-through"         There appear to be no stability issues or other concerns from this relatively small fix -- M105 merge approved, please merge this fix to branch 5195 asap so this fix can be included in tomorrow's M105 beta release since this feature scheduled to be launched in M105 when promoted to stable.<span class="line"><!---->There appear to be no stability issues or other concerns from this relatively small fix -- M105 merge approved, please merge this fix to branch 5195 asap so this fix can be included in tomorrow's M105 beta release since this feature scheduled to be launched in M105 when promoted to stable.<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

When side panel is closed, it destroys the side panel WebView, which destroys side search side panel WebContents and cause a UaF inside WebContentsImpl::OpenURL.<span class="line"><!---->search side panel, a new foreground will be created to trigger closing the side panel. When side panel is closed, it destroys the side panel WebView, which destroys side search side panel WebContents and cause a UaF inside WebContentsImpl::OpenURL.<!----></span><br><br>This CL prevents WebView from destroying side search side panel WebContents when side search entry is still active in this particular case. A possibly better approach in the future may be have the side panel framework not destroy the view when the side panel entry is still active.<span class="line"><!---->This CL prevents WebView from destroying side search side panel WebContents when side search entry is still active in this particular case.         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        
          
        <div>
          
        </div>
      <div class="comment-body">
        <mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        <div>
          
        </div>
      </div>

      Steps to reproduce the problem:<b class="line"><!---->Steps to reproduce the problem:<!----></b><br>1. download asan-linux-release-1030370.zip and unzip<span class="line"><!---->1. download asan-linux-release-1030370.zip and unzip<!----></span><br>2. run `./chrome --enable-features=SideSearch,UnifiedSidePanel,SideSearchDSESupport   --user-data-dir=/tmp/noexist`<span class="line"><!---->2. run `./chrome --enable-features=SideSearch,UnifiedSidePanel,SideSearchDSESupport   --user-data-dir=/tmp/noexist`<!----></span><br>3. search anything with<span class="line"><!---->3. search anything with<!----></span> <span class="line"><!----> <!----></span>google.com<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://google.com"><!---->google.com<!----></a> and then navigate to any other search engine (such as<span class="line"><!----> and then navigate to any other search engine (such as<!----></span> <span class="line"><!----> <!----></span>bing.com<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://bing.com"><!---->bing.com<!----></a>)<span class="line"><!---->)<!----></span><br>4. click `Open Search in Side Panel` to open side search in side panel<span class="line"><!---->4. click `Open Search in Side Panel` to open side search in side panel<!----></span><br>5. select any text in side search and right click to choose 'Search Google for XXX'<span class="line"><!---->5. select any text in side search and right click to choose 'Search Google for XXX'<!----></span><br><br>PS: In step 3 you must use <span class="line"><!---->PS: In step 3 you must use <!----></span>`<span class="line"><!---->`<!----></span>google.com<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://google.com"><!---->google.com<!----></a>`. <span class="line"><!---->`. <!----></span>`<span class="line"><!---->`<!----></span>google.com<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://google.com"><!---->google.com<!----></a>.xx`  cannot trigger the Side Search<span class="line"><!---->.xx`  cannot trigger the Side Search<!----></span><br><br>Problem Description:<b class="line"><!---->Problem Description:<!----></b><br># Root Cause <span class="line"><!----># Root Cause <!----></span><br><br>In `WebContentsImpl::OpenURL`[1], when `delelage_->OpenURLFromTab(this, params)` is called(1), the `source_render_frame_host`(2) could be freed in some conditions, the following use of `source_render_frame_host`(3) will cause UAF. <span class="line"><!---->In `WebContentsImpl::OpenURL`[1], when `delelage_-&gt;OpenURLFromTab(this, params)` is called(1), the `source_render_frame_host`(2) could be freed in some conditions, the following use of `source_render_frame_host`(3) will cause UAF. <!----></span><br><br>```[1]<span class="line"><!---->```[1]<!----></span><br>WebContents* WebContentsImpl::OpenURL(const OpenURLParams& params) {<span class="line"><!---->WebContents* WebContentsImpl::OpenURL(const OpenURLParams&amp; params) {<!----></span><br>  TRACE_EVENT1("content", "WebContentsImpl::OpenURL", "url", params.url);<span class="line"><!---->  TRACE_EVENT1("content", "WebContentsImpl::OpenURL", "url", params.url);<!----></span><br>#if DCHECK_IS_ON()<span class="line"><!---->#if DCHECK_IS_ON()<!----></span><br>  DCHECK(params.Valid());<span class="line"><!---->  DCHECK(params.Valid());<!----></span><br>#endif<span class="line"><!---->#endif<!----></span><br><br>  if (!delegate_) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (!delegate_) {<!----></span><br>    // Embedder can delay setting a delegate on new WebContents with<span class="line"><!---->    // Embedder can delay setting a delegate on new WebContents with<!----></span><br>    // WebContentsDelegate::ShouldResumeRequestsForCreatedWindow. In the mean<span class="line"><!---->    // WebContentsDelegate::ShouldResumeRequestsForCreatedWindow. In the mean<!----></span><br>    // time, navigations, including the initial one, that goes through OpenURL<span class="line"><!---->    // time, navigations, including the initial one, that goes through OpenURL<!----></span><br>    // should be delayed until embedder is ready to resume loading.<span class="line"><!---->    // should be delayed until embedder is ready to resume loading.<!----></span><br>    delayed_open_url_params_ = std::make_unique<OpenURLParams>(params);<span class="line"><!---->    delayed_open_url_params_ = std::make_unique&lt;OpenURLParams&gt;(params);<!----></span><br><br>    // If there was a navigation deferred when creating the window through<span class="line"><!---->    // If there was a navigation deferred when creating the window through<!----></span><br>    // CreateNewWindow, drop it in favor of this navigation.<span class="line"><!---->    // CreateNewWindow, drop it in favor of this navigation.<!----></span><br>    delayed_load_url_params_.reset();<span class="line"><!---->    delayed_load_url_params_.reset();<!----></span><br><br>    return nullptr;<span class="line"><!---->    return nullptr;<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br><br>  RenderFrameHost* source_render_frame_host = RenderFrameHost::FromID(  // (2)<span class="line"><!---->  RenderFrameHost* source_render_frame_host = RenderFrameHost::FromID(  // (2)<!----></span><br>      params.source_render_process_id, params.source_render_frame_id);<span class="line"><!---->      params.source_render_process_id, params.source_render_frame_id);<!----></span><br><br>  // Prevent frames that are not active (e.g. a prerendering page) from opening<span class="line"><!---->  // Prevent frames that are not active (e.g. a prerendering page) from opening<!----></span><br>  // new windows, tabs, popups, etc.<span class="line"><!---->  // new windows, tabs, popups, etc.<!----></span><br>  if (params.disposition != WindowOpenDisposition::CURRENT_TAB &&<span class="line"><!---->  if (params.disposition != WindowOpenDisposition::CURRENT_TAB &amp;&amp;<!----></span><br>      source_render_frame_host && !source_render_frame_host->IsActive()) {<span class="line"><!---->      source_render_frame_host &amp;&amp; !source_render_frame_host-&gt;IsActive()) {<!----></span><br>    return nullptr;<span class="line"><!---->    return nullptr;<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br><br>  if (params.frame_tree_node_id != FrameTreeNode::kFrameTreeNodeInvalidId) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (params.frame_tree_node_id != FrameTreeNode::kFrameTreeNodeInvalidId) {<!----></span><br>    if (auto* frame_tree_node =<span class="line"><!---->    if (auto* frame_tree_node =<!----></span><br>            FrameTreeNode::GloballyFindByID(params.frame_tree_node_id)) {<span class="line"><!---->            FrameTreeNode::GloballyFindByID(params.frame_tree_node_id)) {<!----></span><br>      // If a frame tree node ID is specified and it exists, ensure it is for a<span class="line"><!---->      // If a frame tree node ID is specified and it exists, ensure it is for a<!----></span><br>      // node within this WebContents. Note: this WebContents could be hosting<span class="line"><!---->      // node within this WebContents. Note: this WebContents could be hosting<!----></span><br>      // multiple frame trees (e.g. prerendering) so it's not enough to check<span class="line"><!---->      // multiple frame trees (e.g. prerendering) so it's not enough to check<!----></span><br>      // against this->primary_frame_tree_. Check against page_delegate(), which<span class="line"><!---->      // against this-&gt;primary_frame_tree_. Check against page_delegate(), which<!----></span><br>      // is always a WebContentsImpl, while delegate() may be implemented by<span class="line"><!---->      // is always a WebContentsImpl, while delegate() may be implemented by<!----></span><br>      // something else such as for prerendered frame trees.<span class="line"><!---->      // something else such as for prerendered frame trees.<!----></span><br>      FrameTree* frame_tree = frame_tree_node->frame_tree();<span class="line"><!---->      FrameTree* frame_tree = frame_tree_node-&gt;frame_tree();<!----></span><br>      CHECK_EQ(frame_tree->page_delegate(), this);<span class="line"><!---->      CHECK_EQ(frame_tree-&gt;page_delegate(), this);<!----></span><br><br>      // Prerendering and fenced frame navigations are hidden from embedders.<span class="line"><!---->      // Prerendering and fenced frame navigations are hidden from embedders.<!----></span><br>      // If the navigation is targeting a frame in a prerendering or fenced<span class="line"><!---->      // If the navigation is targeting a frame in a prerendering or fenced<!----></span><br>      // frame tree, we shouldn't run that navigation through the embedder<span class="line"><!---->      // frame tree, we shouldn't run that navigation through the embedder<!----></span><br>      // delegate. Embedder implementations of<span class="line"><!---->      // delegate. Embedder implementations of<!----></span><br>      // `WebContentsDelegate::OpenURLFromTab` assume that the primary<span class="line"><!---->      // `WebContentsDelegate::OpenURLFromTab` assume that the primary<!----></span><br>      // frame tree Navigation controller should be used for navigating.<span class="line"><!---->      // frame tree Navigation controller should be used for navigating.<!----></span><br>      // Instead, we just navigate directly on the relevant frame<span class="line"><!---->      // Instead, we just navigate directly on the relevant frame<!----></span><br>      // tree.<span class="line"><!---->      // tree.<!----></span><br>      if (frame_tree->type() == FrameTree::Type::kPrerender ||<span class="line"><!---->      if (frame_tree-&gt;type() == FrameTree::Type::kPrerender ||<!----></span><br>          frame_tree->type() == FrameTree::Type::kFencedFrame) {<span class="line"><!---->          frame_tree-&gt;type() == FrameTree::Type::kFencedFrame) {<!----></span><br>        DCHECK_EQ(params.disposition, WindowOpenDisposition::CURRENT_TAB);<span class="line"><!---->        DCHECK_EQ(params.disposition, WindowOpenDisposition::CURRENT_TAB);<!----></span><br>        frame_tree->controller().LoadURLWithParams(<span class="line"><!---->        frame_tree-&gt;controller().LoadURLWithParams(<!----></span><br>            NavigationController::LoadURLParams(params));<span class="line"><!---->            NavigationController::LoadURLParams(params));<!----></span><br>        return this;<span class="line"><!---->        return this;<!----></span><br>      }<span class="line"><!---->      }<!----></span><br>    } else {<span class="line"><!---->    } else {<!----></span><br>      // If the node doesn't exist it was probably removed from its frame tree.<span class="line"><!---->      // If the node doesn't exist it was probably removed from its frame tree.<!----></span><br>      // In that case, abort since continuing would navigate the root frame.<span class="line"><!---->      // In that case, abort since continuing would navigate the root frame.<!----></span><br>      return nullptr;<span class="line"><!---->      return nullptr;<!----></span><br>    }<span class="line"><!---->    }<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br><br>  WebContents* new_contents = delegate_->OpenURLFromTab(this, params);  //(1)<span class="line"><!---->  WebContents* new_contents = delegate_-&gt;OpenURLFromTab(this, params);  //(1)<!----></span><br><br>  if (source_render_frame_host && params.source_site_instance) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (source_render_frame_host &amp;&amp; params.source_site_instance) {<!----></span><br>    CHECK_EQ(source_render_frame_host->GetSiteInstance(),   // (3)<span class="line"><!---->    CHECK_EQ(source_render_frame_host-&gt;GetSiteInstance(),   // (3)<!----></span><br>             params.source_site_instance.get());<span class="line"><!---->             params.source_site_instance.get());<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br>  if (new_contents && source_render_frame_host && new_contents != this) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (new_contents &amp;&amp; source_render_frame_host &amp;&amp; new_contents != this) {<!----></span><br>    observers_.NotifyObservers(<span class="line"><!---->    observers_.NotifyObservers(<!----></span><br>        &WebContentsObserver::DidOpenRequestedURL, new_contents,<span class="line"><!---->        &amp;WebContentsObserver::DidOpenRequestedURL, new_contents,<!----></span><br>        source_render_frame_host, params.url, params.referrer,<span class="line"><!---->        source_render_frame_host, params.url, params.referrer,<!----></span><br>        params.disposition, params.transition, params.started_from_context_menu,<span class="line"><!---->        params.disposition, params.transition, params.started_from_context_menu,<!----></span><br>        params.is_renderer_initiated);<span class="line"><!---->        params.is_renderer_initiated);<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br><br>  return new_contents;<span class="line"><!---->  return new_contents;<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>When calling `OpenURLFromTab`, SideSearch will actually call `UnifiedSideSearchController::OpenURLFromTab`[2], it will use SideSearch's `browser_view` to call `OpenURL`. According to the ASAN log[3], `OpenURL` will  change to a new Tab, so the SidePanel will Close and destroy the corresponding FrameTree and RenderFrameHost.<span class="line"><!---->When calling `OpenURLFromTab`, SideSearch will actually call `UnifiedSideSearchController::OpenURLFromTab`[2], it will use SideSearch's `browser_view` to call `OpenURL`. According to the ASAN log[3], `OpenURL` will  change to a new Tab, so the SidePanel will Close and destroy the corresponding FrameTree and RenderFrameHost.<!----></span><br><br><br>```[2]<span class="line"><!---->```[2]<!----></span><br>content::WebContents* UnifiedSideSearchController::OpenURLFromTab(<span class="line"><!---->content::WebContents* UnifiedSideSearchController::OpenURLFromTab(<!----></span><br>    content::WebContents* source,<span class="line"><!---->    content::WebContents* source,<!----></span><br>    const content::OpenURLParams& params) {<span class="line"><!---->    const content::OpenURLParams&amp; params) {<!----></span><br>  auto* browser_view = GetBrowserView();<span class="line"><!---->  auto* browser_view = GetBrowserView();<!----></span><br>  return browser_view ? browser_view->browser()->OpenURL(params) : nullptr;<span class="line"><!---->  return browser_view ? browser_view-&gt;browser()-&gt;OpenURL(params) : nullptr;<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br><br>```[3]<span class="line"><!---->```[3]<!----></span><br>#18 0x562c75138396 in SidePanelCoordinator::Close() chrome/browser/ui/views/side_panel/side_panel_coordinator.cc:270:5<span class="line"><!---->#18 0x562c75138396 in SidePanelCoordinator::Close() chrome/browser/ui/views/side_panel/side_panel_coordinator.cc:270:5<!----></span><br>#19 0x562c74598ae2 in TabStripModel::OnChange(TabStripModelChange const&, TabStripSelectionChange const&) chrome/browser/ui/tabs/tab_strip_model.cc:461:14<span class="line"><!---->#19 0x562c74598ae2 in TabStripModel::OnChange(TabStripModelChange const&amp;, TabStripSelectionChange const&amp;) chrome/browser/ui/tabs/tab_strip_model.cc:461:14<!----></span><br>#20 0x562c745975c5 in TabStripModel::InsertWebContentsAtImpl(int, std::Cr::unique_ptr<content::WebContents, std::Cr::default_delete<content::WebContents>>, int, absl::optional<tab_groups::Tab<span class="line"><!---->#20 0x562c745975c5 in TabStripModel::InsertWebContentsAtImpl(int, std::Cr::unique_ptr&lt;content::WebContents, std::Cr::default_delete&lt;content::WebContents&gt;&gt;, int, absl::optional&lt;tab_groups::Tab<!----></span><br><br>Additional Comments:<b class="line"><!---->Additional Comments:<!----></b><br><br><br>Chrome version: <b class="line"><!---->Chrome version: <!----></b>103.0.0.0 <span class="line"><!---->103.0.0.0 <!----></span>Channel: <b class="line"><!---->Channel: <!----></b>Not sure<span class="line"><!---->Not sure<!----></span><br><br>OS:<b class="line"><!---->OS:<!----></b>Linux<span class="line"><!---->Linux<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        I can reproduce this in 1030430 (which is M106), but not 1012727 (104) or 1002919 (103). From what I can tell `--enable-features=SideSearch,SideSearchDSESupport` actually suffices for this (i.e. UnifiedSidePanel isn't required).<span class="line"><!---->I can reproduce this in 1030430 (which is M106), but not 1012727 (104) or 1002919 (103).         Currently this will only repro in versions M105+.<span class="line"><!---->Currently this will only repro in versions M105+.<!----></span><br><br>This requires Side Search and the Unified Side Panel to both be enabled (i.e. --enable-features=SideSearch,UnifiedSidePanel,SideSearchDSESupport ) - and for Side Search to be running the code that integrates it with the Unified Side Panel. The integration was added in Chrome M105.<span class="line"><!---->This requires Side Search and the Unified Side Panel to both be enabled (i.e. --enable-features=SideSearch,UnifiedSidePanel,SideSearchDSESupport ) - and for Side Search to be running the code that integrates it with the Unified Side Panel. The integration was added in Chrome M105.<!----></span><br><br>To trigger the crash the user needs to explicitly enable the UnifiedSidePanel flag on M105 since the UnifiedSidePanel flag is currently only at 50% Canary / Dev. This likely still warrants a RBS label however so we'll want the fix to land by stable cut later this month.<span class="line"><!---->To trigger the crash the user needs to explicitly enable the UnifiedSidePanel flag on M105 since the UnifiedSidePanel flag is currently only at 50% Canary / Dev. This likely still warrants a RBS label however so we'll want the fix to land by stable cut later this month.<!----></span><br><br>Yuheng is working on a fix and we should have this ready for a merge soon.<span class="line"><!---->Yuheng is working on a fix and we should have this ready for a merge soon.<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2"><!---->d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2<!----></a><br>Author: Yuheng Huang <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Yuheng Huang &lt;<!----></span>yuhengh@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yuhengh@chromium.org"><!---->yuhengh@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Sun Aug 07 23:40:07 2022<span class="line"><!---->Date: Sun Aug 07 23:40:07 2022<!----></span><br><br>Side search v2: fix uaf with right click search<span class="line"><!---->Side search v2: fix uaf with right click search<!----></span><br><br>When right click context menu and search Google for ... from the side<span class="line"><!---->When right click context menu and search Google for ... from the side<!----></span><br>search side panel, a new foreground will be created to trigger closing the side panel. When side panel is closed, it destroys the side panel WebView, which destroys side search side panel WebContents and cause a UaF inside WebContentsImpl::OpenURL.<span class="line"><!---->search side panel, a new foreground will be created to trigger closing the side panel. When side panel is closed, it destroys the side panel WebView, which destroys side search side panel WebContents and cause a UaF inside WebContentsImpl::OpenURL.<!----></span><br><br>This CL prevents WebView from destroying side search side panel WebContents when side search entry is still active in this particular case. A possibly better approach in the future may be have the side panel framework not destroy the view when the side panel entry is still active.<span class="line"><!---->This CL prevents WebView from destroying side search side panel WebContents when side search entry is still active in this particular case. A possibly better approach in the future may be have the side panel framework not destroy the view when the side panel entry is still active.<!----></span><br><br>Bug: 1349687<a class="strike-through"         The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/e1dcdf0a35d65864f51bf6d38e8c9e7a9df29214<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/e1dcdf0a35d65864f51bf6d38e8c9e7a9df29214"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/e1dcdf0a35d65864f51bf6d38e8c9e7a9df29214<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>e1dcdf0a35d65864f51bf6d38e8c9e7a9df29214<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/e1dcdf0a35d65864f51bf6d38e8c9e7a9df29214"><!---->e1dcdf0a35d65864f51bf6d38e8c9e7a9df29214<!----></a><br>Author: Yuheng Huang <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Yuheng Huang &lt;<!----></span>yuhengh@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yuhengh@chromium.org"><!---->yuhengh@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Tue Aug 09 19:20:02 2022<span class="line"><!---->Date: Tue Aug 09 19:20:02 2022<!----></span><br><br>[M105 Merge] Side search v2: fix uaf with right click search<span class="line"><!---->[M105 Merge] Side search v2: fix uaf with right click search<!----></span><br><br>When right click context menu and search Google for ... from the side<span class="line"><!---->When right click context menu and search Google for ... from the side<!----></span><br>search side panel, a new foreground will be created to trigger closing the side panel. When side panel is closed, it destroys the side panel WebView, which destroys side search side panel WebContents and cause a UaF inside WebContentsImpl::OpenURL.<span class="line"><!---->search side panel, a new foreground will be created to trigger closing the side panel. When side panel is closed, it destroys the side panel WebView, which destroys side search side panel WebContents and cause a UaF inside WebContentsImpl::OpenURL.<!----></span><br><br>This CL prevents WebView from destroying side search side panel WebContents when side search entry is still active in this particular case. A possibly better approach in the future may be have the side panel framework not destroy the view when the side panel entry is still active.<span class="line"><!---->This CL prevents WebView from destroying side search side panel WebContents when side search entry is still active in this particular case. A possibly better approach in the future may be have the side panel framework not destroy the view when the side panel entry is still active.<!----></span><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span class="line"><!---->(cherry picked from commit <!----></span>d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2"><!---->d633877e387532422e93ec9ff61778b1676654c2<!----></a>)<span class="line"><!---->)<!----></span><br><br>Bug: 1349687<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1349687" title="Security: Heap-use-after-free in WebContentsImpl::OpenURL"><!---->Bug: 1349687<!----></a><br>Change-Id: I74a5cc9cc353e108e4300db9a05dbad1267613c3<span class="line"><!---->Change-Id: I74a5cc9cc353e108e4300db9a05dbad1267613c3<!----></span><br>Reviewed-on: <span class="line"><!---->Reviewed-on: <!----></span>https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/3812004<a class="undefined" target="_blank"         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products.
